verses.verse: Who is as the wise <WH2450> man <WH3045>? and who knoweth the interpretation <WH6592> of a thing <WH1697>? A man <WH120>'s wisdom <WH2451> maketh his face <WH6440> to shine <WH215>, and the hardness <WH5797> of his face <WH6440> is changed <WH8132>.
I counsel thee <WH8104>, Keep the king <WH4428>'s command <WH6310>, and that in regard <WH1700> of the oath <WH7621> of God <WH430>.
Be not hasty <WH926> to go out <WH3212> of his presence <WH6440>; persist <WH5975> not in an evil <WH7451> thing <WH1697>: for he doeth <WH6213> whatsoever pleaseth him <WH2654>.
For the king <WH4428>'s word <WH1697> hath power <WH7983>; and who may say <WH559> unto him <WH6213>, What doest thou?
Whoso keepeth <WH8104> the commandment <WH4687> shall know <WH3045> no evil <WH7451> thing <WH1697>; and a wise man <WH2450>'s heart <WH3820> discerneth <WH3045> time <WH6256> and judgment <WH4941>:
for to every purpose <WH2656> there is <WH3426> a time <WH6256> and judgment <WH4941>; because the misery <WH7451> of man <WH120> is great upon him <WH7227>:
for he knoweth <WH3045> not that which shall be <WH5046>; for who can tell him how it shall be?

There is no man <WH120> that hath power <WH7989> over the spirit <WH7307> to retain <WH3607> the spirit <WH7307>; neither hath he power <WH7983> over the day <WH3117> of death <WH4194>; and there is no discharge <WH4917> in war <WH4421>: neither shall wickedness <WH7562> deliver <WH4422> him that is given to it <WH1167>.

All this have I seen <WH7200>, and applied <WH5414> my heart <WH3820> unto every work <WH4639> that is done <WH6213> under the sun <WH8121>: there is a time <WH6256> wherein one man <WH120> hath power <WH7980> over another to his hurt <WH7451>.

So <WH3651> I saw <WH7200> the wicked <WH7563> buried <WH6912>, and they came <WH935> to the grave <WH1980>; and they that had done <WH6213> right went away from the holy <WH6918> place <WH4725>, and were forgotten <WH7911> in the city <WH5892>: this also is vanity <WH1892>.

Because sentence <WH6599> against an evil <WH7451> work <WH4639> is not executed <WH6213> speedily <WH4120>, therefore the heart <WH3820> of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> is fully set <WH4390> in them to do <WH6213> evil <WH7451>.

Though a sinner <WH2398> do <WH6213> evil <WH7451> a hundred times <WH3967>, and prolong <WH748> his days <WH3045>, yet surely I know that it shall be well <WH2896> with them that fear <WH3373> God <WH430>, that fear <WH3373> before him <WH6440>:

but it shall not be well <WH2896> with the wicked <WH7563>, neither shall he prolong <WH748> his days <WH3117>, which are as a shadow <WH6738>; because he feareth <WH3373> not before <WH6440> God <WH430>.

There is <WH3426> a vanity <WH1892> which is done <WH6213> upon the earth <WH776>, that there are righteous <WH6662> men unto whom it happeneth <WH5060> according to the work <WH4639> of the wicked <WH7563>; again <WH3426>, there are wicked <WH7563> men to whom it happeneth <WH5060> according to the work <WH4639> of the righteous <WH6662>: I said <WH559> that this also <WH1571> is vanity <WH1892>.

Then I commended <WH7623> mirth <WH8057>, because a man <WH120> hath no better thing <WH2896> under the sun <WH8121>, than to eat <WH398>, and to drink <WH8354>, and to be joyful <WH8055>: for that shall abide <WH3867> with him in his labor <WH5999> all the days <WH3117> of his life <WH2416> which God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> him under the sun <WH8121>.

When I applied <WH5414> my heart <WH3820> to know <WH3045> wisdom <WH2451>, and to see <WH7200> the business <WH6045> that is done <WH6213> upon the earth <WH776> (for also there is that neither day <WH3117> nor night <WH3915> seeth <WH7200> sleep <WH8142> with his eyes <WH5869>),

then I beheld <WH7200> all the work <WH4639> of God <WH430>, that man <WH120> cannot <WH3201> find out <WH4672> the work <WH4639> that is done <WH6213> under the sun <WH8121>: because <WH834> however <WH7945> much a man <WH120> labor <WH5998> to seek it out <WH1245>, yet he shall not find <WH4672> it <WH2450>; yea moreover, though a wise man think <WH559> to know <WH3045> it <WH3201>, yet shall he not be able to find it <WH4672>.
